00028 #include <string.h>
00029 
00030 #include "hmac.h"
00031 #include "sha1.h"
00032 
00033 #define HMAC_IPAD 0x36
00034 #define HMAC_OPAD 0x5c
00035 
00036 int HMAC_SHA1(unsigned char* digest, unsigned char* text, unsigned int textlen, unsigned char* key, unsigned int keylen) {  
00037   
00038   unsigned char k_ipad[64], k_opad[64];
00039   
00040   // This is untested
00041   if (keylen > 64) {
00042     SHA1_CTX context;
00043     SHA1Init(&context);  
00044     SHA1Update(&context, key, keylen);
00045     SHA1Final(key, &context);
00046     keylen = 20;
00047   }
00048   
00049   memcpy(k_ipad, key, keylen);
00050   memcpy(k_opad, key, keylen);
00051   memset(k_ipad+keylen, 0, 64 - keylen);
00052   memset(k_opad+keylen, 0, 64 - keylen);
00053   
00054   unsigned int i;
00055   for (i = 0; i < 64; i++) {
00056     k_ipad[i] ^= HMAC_IPAD;
00057     k_opad[i] ^= HMAC_OPAD;
00058   }  
00059   
00060   SHA1_CTX context;
00061   SHA1Init(&context);  
00062   SHA1Update(&context, k_ipad, 64);
00063   SHA1Update(&context, text, textlen);  
00064   SHA1Final(digest, &context);
00065   
00066   SHA1Init(&context);
00067   SHA1Update(&context, k_opad, 64);
00068   SHA1Update(&context, digest, 20);
00069   SHA1Final(digest, &context);
00070   
00071   return 20;
00072 }
